rosalinda-persona-agent.author: Marcus T.
rosalinda-persona-agent.title: Changed how I operate entirely
rosalinda-persona-agent.body: I was skeptical about running a 'persona agent' but after two weeks this thing manages my Twitter, morning briefings, and daily task scheduling. It's like having a version of me that never sleeps.

rosalinda-persona-agent.author: Priya K.
rosalinda-persona-agent.title: Onboarding is genuinely excellent
rosalinda-persona-agent.body: The walkthrough guide is the best I've seen for any AI product. Got my agent live in 90 minutes. The SOUL.md concept is a game changer for giving it a consistent voice.

rosalinda-persona-agent.author: Derek M.
rosalinda-persona-agent.title: Worth every penny of the $99
rosalinda-persona-agent.body: I paid $99 and got back 10+ hours a week in recovered time. The multi-channel setup (WhatsApp + Twitter + email) works without any babysitting.

rosalinda-persona-agent.author: Sasha N.
rosalinda-persona-agent.title: Impressive but needs patience to configure
rosalinda-persona-agent.body: The agent itself is fantastic once you get it dialed in. The first few days require some tweaking to match your voice. After that — it's magic.

bedtimemagic-growth-bot.author: Ling X.
bedtimemagic-growth-bot.title: My Twitter went from 200 to 800 followers in 3 weeks
bedtimemagic-growth-bot.body: This bot just works. Consistent posting, smart replies, no spam behavior. My engagement rate actually improved while following count grew.

bedtimemagic-growth-bot.author: Tomas E.
bedtimemagic-growth-bot.title: Solid foundation, easy to customize
bedtimemagic-growth-bot.body: The n8n flows are well-organized and easy to modify for your niche. I switched from parenting to SaaS founders and it adapted well.

bedtimemagic-growth-bot.author: Amara J.
bedtimemagic-growth-bot.title: Finally, automation that doesn't feel robotic
bedtimemagic-growth-bot.body: The content it generates actually sounds human. I've had people DM me asking if I write everything myself.

daily-morning-report.author: Carlos V.
daily-morning-report.title: Best $19 I've spent on any tool
daily-morning-report.body: My morning briefing lands at exactly 6am every day. Revenue, top tweets, and my 3 priorities. I start every day knowing exactly where I stand.

daily-morning-report.author: Nina H.
daily-morning-report.title: Replaced my 30-minute morning scroll
daily-morning-report.body: I used to spend 30 minutes checking dashboards and feeds every morning. This does it all and delivers a summary. My mornings are reclaimed.

daily-morning-report.author: James O.
daily-morning-report.title: The streak tracker is a brilliant motivator
daily-morning-report.body: Small detail but the 7-day streak tracker in the briefing keeps me consistent. It's part habit-tracker, part morning briefing.

daily-morning-report.author: Rachel S.
daily-morning-report.title: Zapier version has a slight delay sometimes
daily-morning-report.body: The OpenClaw version is flawless. The Zapier version sometimes runs 5-10 minutes late on busy mornings. Not a dealbreaker but worth noting.

content-machine.author: Kwame L.
content-machine.title: 5x my content output instantly
content-machine.body: One topic → 7 tweets + LinkedIn post + newsletter section + blog draft. In the time it took me to write one tweet before, I now have a full content week queued.

content-machine.author: Sophie T.
content-machine.title: The brand voice config is a killer feature
content-machine.body: Being able to define my tone in a config file means the output actually sounds like me, not generic AI slop. That config doc alone is worth the price.

content-machine.author: Ben R.
content-machine.title: Perfect for my newsletter production
content-machine.body: I run a weekly newsletter. This cut my production time from 4 hours to 45 minutes. The blog draft needs editing but it's a great starting point.

improvmx-email-setup.author: Diana C.
improvmx-email-setup.title: 10-minute setup, no exaggeration
improvmx-email-setup.body: Did the whole thing — MX records, 3 aliases, Zapier routing — in 12 minutes. The DNS instructions are crystal clear even if you've never touched DNS before.

improvmx-email-setup.author: Finn A.
improvmx-email-setup.title: Saved me $12/month vs Google Workspace
improvmx-email-setup.body: Was paying for Google Workspace just for the custom email. This + ImprovMX free tier does the same job. Clear ROI.

improvmx-email-setup.author: Yuki N.
improvmx-email-setup.title: Great guide, Zapier setup could be cleaner
improvmx-email-setup.body: The ImprovMX DNS setup instructions are perfect. The Zapier email routing section is a bit verbose but works. Would love a video walkthrough version.
